CustomField.formula: CASE(Ticket_on_behalf_of__r.SIP_Current_Title__c, "Sales Mgr","Manager", "SIP Team","SIP Team", CASE( CreatedBy.SIP_Current_Title__c, "Sales Mgr","Manager", "SIP Team","SIP Team", "Rep"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: this formula helps identify if the person submitting a ticket is a manager or a rep. if a manager then the ticket is automatically approved, if a rep then it has to go through one of the approval processes.
CustomField.label: BehalfMgr
